name: Kiama FoxWarrior
description:
Kiama is in action! This little fox with big gun is on a mission to save her babies from dangerous enemies in a wild animal world.

This game is still under development. The current version is a short demo and does not represent the final product.

CONTROLS:
LEFT - a / left arrow
RIGHT - d / right arrow
JUMP - w / up arrow
SHOT - mouse left / space
CHANGE WEAPON - TAB / q
